flawed_nl_solution:
The burritos have 10*120=<<10*120=1200>>1200 calories
That means he gets 1200/6=<<1200/6=200>>200 calories per dollar
The burgers get 5*400=<<5*400=2000>>2000 calories
So he gets 2000/8=<<2000/8=520>>520 calories per dollar
So he gets 520-200=<<520-200=320>>320 more calories per dollar from the burgers
#### 320

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 250, not 520. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
